div.bibl: Abendpost, August 13th, 1897. German and Bohemian Stone Cutters.

body.p: The Aid Society for German and Bohemian Stone Cutters, founded a short time ago, held in Ruehl's Hall a well attended meeting on which occasion 30 new members joined the organization. The total membership is now 115. The Club considers as its main task, to watch the interests of the German and Bohemian stone masons and to protect its members against exploitation, by tradesmen of other nationalities...
